Package gr.aueb.cf.ch12.exercises.exe2.backapp.model

Class OverdraftAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.aueb.cf.ch12.exercises.exe2.backapp.model.OverdraftAccount
  • public final class OverdraftAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The OverdraftAccount class represents a bank account with overdraft capability, allowing the balance to go below zero. It contains details such as IBAN, holder, and balance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OverdraftAccount​(java.lang.String iban, Holder holder, double balance)
      Constructs a new OverdraftAccount with the specified details.

      Retrieves the IBAN associated with the overdraft account.

      Withdraws the specified amount from the overdraft account, given a valid social security number (SSN).

      • OverdraftAccount

        public OverdraftAccount​(java.lang.String iban,
                        Holder holder,
                        double balance)
        Constructs a new OverdraftAccount with the specified details.
        Parameters:
        iban - The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) associated with the overdraft account.
        holder - The holder associated with the overdraft account.
        balance - The current balance of the overdraft account.

        Retrieves the holder associated with the overdraft account.
        Returns:

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Retrieves the current balance of the overdraft account.
        Returns:

      • setBalance

        public void setBalance​(double balance)
        Sets the balance of the overdraft account to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        balance - The new balance.

      • converToString

        public java.lang.String converToString()
        Converts the overdraft account object to a string representation.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the overdraft account, including IBAN, balance, and holder information.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw​(double amount,
                     java.lang.String ssn)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Withdraws the specified amount from the overdraft account, given a valid social security number (SSN).
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to withdraw.
        ssn - The social security number for verification.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the amount is zero or negative, or if the provided SSN is incorrect.
